title: Czech Republic 1-1 England LIVE score: Team news, TV channel and live stream details
text:
England continue their Euro 2020 qualifying campaign when they take on Czech Republic tonight.

Gareth Southgate's side travel to Prague top of Group A after a perfect start in their opening four games.

The Three Lions thrashed the Czechs when the two sides met in the reverse fixture at Wembley back in March.

Raheem Sterling's hat-trick helped England to a thumping 5-0 win over their nearest challengers in the group.

They lead their opponents by three points after four games, although the hosts have played one more.

England XI: Pickford, Trippier, Rose, Rice, Keane, Maguire, Sterling, Henderson, Kane, Sancho, Mount.

Czech Rep XI: Vaclik, Coufal, Celustka, Brabec, Boril, Soucek, Kral, Masopust, Darida, Jankto, Schick.

TV and live stream: The match is being shown live on ITV1. It can be live streamed for those in the UK on the ITV Player website.
description: The Three Lions are continuing their Euro 2020 qualifying campaign as they face the Czechs in Prague
